osm_elevation

Source: R/elevation.R
osm_elevation.Rd

Add elevation data to a previously-extracted OSM data set, using a pre-downloaded global elevation file from http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org/srtmdata. Currently only works for SC-class objects returned from osmdata_sc.

osm_elevation(dat, elev_file)

Arguments

dat

An SC object produced by osmdata_sc.
elev_file

A vector of one or more character strings specifying paths to .tif files containing global elevation data.

Value

A modified version of the input dat with an additional z_ column appended to the vertices.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value

Developed by Mark Padgham, Bob Rudis, Robin Lovelace, Maëlle Salmon.
